mdRecord.dcterms:title: Map of town of West Lynchburg, Campbell County, Va: Property of the West Lynchburg Land Company / prepared by G. Wm. Baist, Map Publisher, 906 Walnut St., Philadelphia
Property of the West Lynchburg Land Company
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Baist, G. Wm. (George William), 1859-1927 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : col. ; 56 x 80 cm. on sheet 60 x 84 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Shows city sections, with block and lot numbers. [original]
Note upper left: The West Lynchburg Land Company, of Campbell County, Virginia, reserves the full, free and exclusive righ to the streets, avenues and alleys, now or hereafter... [original]
Four lithographic vignettes: West Lynchburg Furniture Company's Factory Building -- Hotel -- Cottage for hotel site -- Valley Engine & Machine Works. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Imperfect: Many scattered small areas of text lost where paper has peeled from its linen backing. Handwritten information has been added in red ink. [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: West Lynchburg Land Company (Lynchburg, Va.)
